translation: Little by little, let him attain steadiness of the intellect by holding it firmly; having made the mind establish itself in the Self, let him not think of anything else.
commentary: 6.25 Slowly gradually? Slowly gradually? Uparamet let him attain to ietude? Buddhya by the intellect? Dhritigrihitaya held in firmness? self-contained placed in the Self? The mind the mind? doing having made? Not not? A little anything? Even even? Chintayet let him think.Commentary Should the practitioner of Yoga attain tranillity gradually or by degrees? by,means of the intellect controlled by steadiness. The peace
